title: Remember kids:
body:
You are not in the LCS
You do not play in the LCS because you aren't good enough. Especially not when you are in bronze or silver
LCS players get away with things you've never seen before because they're good at this game
LCS players can play crazy things because they have a deep understanding of this game's (and its champions') mechanics
You are not as good as you think. You cannot do these crazy things because you do not understand many of the finer mechanics that are necessary

Please, next time you wanna try the hottest new LCS craze, just remember: Faker makes ANYTHING mid look good. That doesn't mean YOU can.
